oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Brotherton House, near Chattanooga, Tenn.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Color tinted photograph of a group of unidentified people visiting the grounds of the Brotherton House, also known as the Brotherton Cabin, in the Chickamauga & Chattanooga National Military Park. Features a bottom white border, undivided back, and narrative on reverse. There is handwritten correspondence on both sides and a May 22, 1908 postmark. Postcard printed in Germany. [No. 2463]
oai_dc:dc.dc:coverage: Chickamauga & Chattanooga National Military Park (Ga. And Tenn.); Chickamauga (Ga.); Walker County (Ga.)
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Houses; People; Cannons; Trees
